name: Kathryn Watson
what_you_do: Kathryn Watson is a professional motivational speaker and Caregiver Life Coach specializing in elder care and senior living navigation.
who_you_serve: Families and caregivers dealing with aging parents and elder care decisions.
social_proof: Author of 'Help! My Parents Are Aging!'
signature_programs: Help! My Parents Are Aging! (book); 25 ways to reduce your stress (topic)
business_focus: Helping families navigate elder care and senior living as a speaker and life coach.
service_provided: motivational speaking, caregiver life coaching, private event speaking
